SELECT A.memb_class, A.memb_no, A.company_name, A.ceo_name, A.business_no, B.occur_type as dishonored_type FROM tb_memb_info A join tb_memb_id_info C on A.user_seq_no = C.user_seq_no and C.is_delete = 'N' left outer join tb_dishonored_info B on A.business_no = B.business_no and B.is_delete = 'N' WHERE A.is_delete = 'N'
AND (A.memb_class = 'B' OR A.memb_class = 'S')
AND A.memb_class = #{membClass}
AND A.business_no LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.company_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.ceo_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY last_date ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

AND (A.memb_class = 'B' OR A.memb_class = 'S')
